content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the authorâ€™s main purpose in the passage?

choices.label: To criticize a belief about the importance of inherited traits
To describe the process by which writers create meaningful stories
To defend a claim about the formation of human identity
To explain the theories of two widely admired figures

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
